custom-sql.sql: SELECT A.classNoteSeq, A.classId, A.contentSeq, A.isContent, A.fileEntryId, ExtractValue(description, 'root/Description[@language-id="@@languageId@@"]') AS description, A.insertDate, A.insertId, ExtractValue(description, 'root/Resume[@language-id="@@languageId@@"]') AS resume FROM EDVIR_ClassNote A WHERE A.isContent = 'false' <isNotEmpty property="classId"> AND classId = #classId# </isNotEmpty> UNION SELECT A.classNoteSeq, A.classId, A.contentSeq, A.isContent, A.fileEntryId, ExtractValue(description, 'root/Description[@language-id="@@languageId@@"]') AS description, A.insertDate, A.insertId, ExtractValue(description, 'root/Resume[@language-id="@@languageId@@"]') AS resume FROM EDVIR_ClassNote A, EDMED_Content B WHERE A.contentSeq = B.contentSeq AND B.openYn = 'Y' <isNotEmpty property="languageId"> AND B.serviceLanguage LIKE "%@@languageId@@%" </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="classId"> AND classId = #classId# </isNotEmpty>
